title: Sonic Adventure™ 2
notes:
WORKAROUND (Works flawlessly!):
In Sonic Adventure 2 game folder, go to resource, gd_PC, create a folder called "SAVEDATA".

Download these UserConfig.cfg and Keyboard.cfg files: https://mega.nz/#F!B2xUlK6a!v4W_yfu4HP2LCWam9B9TVQ

Then go to Config, and extract the two files there.

Lastly, rename "Launcher.exe" to something else, and rename "Sonic2app.exe" to "Launcher.exe". You're done!

Credit to u/PotatoSebs. Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=1&v=5xoyBsYedBQ
